price: Da warfen sich die Zauberer ehrerbietig nieder. Sie sagten: „Wir glauben an den Herrn Haruns und Musas.
arabic: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدٗا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: fa-ul'qiya al-saḥaratu sujjadan qālū āmannā birabbi hārūna wamūsā
